title: Please, help me! Can you tell me the name of this font? It seems as Centaur.
author: Eleto18

comments.content: It must be **[Phaistos Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114845/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=PhaistosBold%20-%20Regular&fid=e7275b711127b352b8339d87f6eb84c3&fsize=60&text=PJHarvey%20To%20Bring%20You%20My%20Love&wrap=2)** by David Berlow, Just van Rossum [Font Bureau, 1991]
:o You're a real genius!! Thanks so much, this is excellent!
